resources.string: Browse the official website of the Printoid application
Read the frequently asked question before sending an email to the developer
Read the latest news about the application and the change logs of the last versions
Install and setup OctoPrint on a Raspberry Pi
Connect Printoid with your OctoPrint server
How to connect to your OctoPrint server from \'outside\' of your local network
Learn more about all the features embedded in the app
Discover the features available from the main dashboard of the app
Discover Printoid Hub (available in Printoid Premium) to monitor all your 3D printers on the same screen
Support two cameras in OctoPrint and show both in Printoid
Support low and high camera quality
Setup scripts to start the camera in low quality or in high quality
Discover the floating icon used to show your camera from everywhere
Discover the system tiles to show your camera or take a snapshot without opening the app
Send / create your own GCODE commands to your 3D printer
Create and send your own SSH commands to your Raspberry Pi (or to the host of your OctoPrint server instance)
Send your own HTTP commands, as if you were using cURL
Discover the OctoPrint plugins supported by Printoid
Receive push notifications from your OctoPrint server in real time on your device
Control ATX/AUX power supply over the PSU Control plugin
Control your power supply / smart plug over a dedicated OctoPrint plugin
Control the Printoid interface with a physical keyboard plugged on your device
Control the Printoid interface Android Debug Bridge (ADB) commands
Learn more about the backup/restore and synchronize features across multiple devices
Learn more about the RollingUp application to manage your spools of filament
Printoid PRO is no more published on Google Play, learn more about this situation and the solutions
Printoid PREMIUM is not available on all countries, learn more about this situation and the solutions
Migrate from Printoid LITE or Printoid PRO to the PREMIUM version of the application
Bring your help to the team and translate the app in your native language
Become a partner of the Printoid project
Support the developer and bring your contribution on Patreon

Read the terms and conditions of the application and the service
Read the privacy policy of the application and the service
Learn more about the permissions requested by the application
